## Release (2024-07-06)

dependency-maintainers 1.1.0 (minor)

#### :rocket: Enhancement
* `dependency-maintainers`
  * [#11](https://github.com/NullVoxPopuli/dependency-maintainers/pull/11) Closes [#9](https://github.com/NullVoxPopuli/dependency-maintainers/issues/9), support scanning a whole monorepo. Add --force (to clear â€¦cache), --recursive (for monorepo), --help, --verbose (for the old output), new output has a progress bar now ([@NullVoxPopuli](https://github.com/NullVoxPopuli))
